code: import React from'react';import{formatDistanceToNow}from'date-fns';import{HeartIcon}from'@heroicons/react/24/outline';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LogEntry=_ref=>{let{log,onLike}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card hover:border-genshin-accent transition-all",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between items-start mb-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"font-bold text-genshin-gold",children:log.traveler_name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-xs text-white/50",children:formatDistanceToNow(new Date(log.created_at),{addSuffix:true})})]}),log.region&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-xs px-2 py-1 rounded-full bg-genshin-accent/20 text-genshin-accent",children:log.region})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-white/80 mb-3",children:log.message}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>onLike(log.id),className:"flex items-center gap-1 text-white/50 hover:text-genshin-accent transition",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HeartIcon,{className:"w-4 h-4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"text-sm",children:[log.likes," likes"]})]})]});};export default LogEntry;
